body_html:
@perhapszzy I have similar problem to yours. Basicaly, I'm trying to set different files as data source in each worker. I am therefore setting up worker specific variable scope for my dataset. What does reseting default graph in chief worker do? Would you like to share your experience with this.

with tf.variable_scope('data_source_task_index_%d' % FLAGS.task_index):
    batch_generator = MyCustomDataSet(FLAGS.batch_size)
